thread.section_title: FlightNetwork.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightNetwork.com | www.flightnetwork.com
thread.title: June Chen-Todt

author: June Chen-Todt
title: June Chen-Todt
text:
I am giving FlightNetwork.com the best rating because of my experience with Tejal Deherkar | Travel Sales Consultant.
I contacted customer service because I purchased a ticket online, but could not get the seats for all passengers at the same ticket pricing. Tejal investigated the issue and found out the reason. She was able to refund my ticket and search for many other options for me.
Tejal is very knowledgeable and efficient in providing the many options to me. She is very polite and professional. Her English is excellent. Her service made it possible for us to have a trip with reasonable connection time at an unbeatable price. My whole family is very grateful for her contribution to our vacation. She will be my go to person next time when I purchase airline tickets.
